name: TeamWorkIsKey WaveDefense V1.2
description:
In this Top Down Shooter you have to survive against waves of enemies which progressively get harder then all you have to do is kill the boss to win.

This is a demo and is likely to change pls tell me if you encounter any bugs 

Update 1.2

Added environment elements which randomly generate when the level is loaded

Added Music

Changed pistol model

Control's

 w to move up 

s to move down 

a to move left 

d to move right left

 mouse button to shoot

 connect a Xbox controller before opening the game to control the second player
